name: Wizard Escape Room
description:
Controls:

WASD = Movement

LeftMouse = Grabbing and Letting Go

RightMouse = Zoom In

Q = Close Game

Description:

This project is a recreation of an old project I made during my first year of college in 2017. Although the project took four months, I'm satisfied with the result. It was a lot of fun improving the visuals(and my craft), getting new skills, and returning to an old project. Thank God that this project is done, and I hope I can do more projects like this.

The game was developed in Unity and rendered with the Unity URP.

Models were made in Maya, and high poly meshes were made in Zbrush, later baked into the low poly meshes in Substance Painter. Textures were all made in Substance Painter, while alphas/symbols/logos are done in Photoshop.

Music is made by: David Fesliyan

Wizard Voice by: Isaiah Villar

Special Thanks to everyone on the Norco GameDev Discord and my brothers for feedback and advice.
